quote_last: . A voice spoke from the study ceiling: "Mrs. McClellan, which poem would you like this evening?". The house was silent. The voice said at last, "Since you express no preference, I shall select a poem at random."
quote_raw: Nine-five. A voice spoke from the study ceiling: "Mrs. McClellan, which poem would you like this evening?". The house was silent. The voice said at last, "Since you express no preference, I shall select a poem at random."
title: There Will Come Soft Rains
author: Ray Bradbury
